A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I understand the gripes everyone has regarding the movie:

- Snoke not being developed
- Weak Canto Bight plot
- Vice Admiral Holdo being useless (though I loved Laura Dern)
- Princess Leia being robbed an impactful death

So on and so forth. But as a lifelong Star Wars fan\, I loved it! It was compelling in certain scenes\, beautifully shot\, had amazing battle/fight scenes\, and the acting was some of the best I've seen so far.

Is it perfect\, nope. Did I enjoy it\, hell yes!
